Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 71st/California
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 69th, and California, due to street blockage near 71st/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, 69th, and California, due to street blockage near 71st/California.

Allow extra travel time.
